article:
One day a small group of young people were at a wildlife park on a field trip.
"Oh, look at her, she's so beautiful." All of us  stared at  a cheetah named Subira except a teenage boy called Cory in the back row, who seemed to be  _  to himself in impatience. When several members of the group turned in his  _  , he brushed the front of his Tshirt as though to  _  dust, and, in a gesture clearly meaning to  _  us, rolled up the right sleeve of his shirt, further showing his welldeveloped  _  . 
Cory had  _  of playing professional baseball someday. No one doubted Cory's  _  . But that was before the car accident. Not only did Cory lose a  _  in the accident but his hope and his spirit.
Seeing such a large audience, Subira couldn't wait to give the crowd a  _  of her skills. "How fast she runs!" one shouted. "But she only has three legs." one cried. 
No one was more  _  than Cory. He stared at the animal with the missing leg and he smiled, tears of hope in his  _  . 
Looking  _  into Cory's face, the organizer explained "It was soon after she came to us that she showed her own worth ---- a  _  gift of love and spirit. In the past few years, the gift of Subira has  _  people around the world,and without words Subria has become our most persuasive   _  , and the most priceless gift."
Cory asked  _  , "Can I touch her?"
As the rest of the group looked on in amazement, the boy wheeled himself over to the large gate and  _  to push it open. The expression on his face was one of great  _  . It was clear that Cory had  _  the gift of Subira.
